sense.def:
The relationship between two people or groups
so občutki, ki jih dve osebi ali skupini gojita druga do druge, in vedênje v medsebojnih stikih.

seg.quote: Pakistan's relationship with India has changed dramatically.

sense.def:
A relationship
je tudi tesno prijateljstvo med dvema osebama, zlasti če vključuje čustva in spolne občutke.

The relationship between two things
je način, kako sta dve stvari povezani med seboj.

seg.quote: What is the relationship between language and thought?
